definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: The function of the follicle cells and egg envelopes is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對濾泡細胞和卵膜的作用進行了闡述。

sentences.english: Follicle cells begin to surround oocyte.
sentences.chinese: 濾泡細胞開始包圍卵母細胞。

sentences.english: These results showed that the colloid or follicular volume became smaller and atrophic.
sentences.chinese: 上述結果說明，膠體或濾泡的體積變小萎縮。

sentences.english: The follicles of the adenoma contain colloid, but there is greater variability in size than normal.
sentences.chinese: 腺瘤濾泡內包含膠質，但濾泡大小不等。

sentences.english: The follicles of the adenoma contain colloid, but there is greater variability in size than normal.
sentences.chinese: 腺瘤濾泡內包含膠質，但濾泡大小不等。

sentences.english: The gonads are the follicular style and are composed of germ cells and nutrition cells.
sentences.chinese: 生殖腺爲濾泡型，由營養細胞和生殖細胞共同構成。

sentences.english: The thyroid consisted of follicles and parafollicular cells.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，甲狀腺實質由濾泡和濾泡旁細胞構成。

sentences.english: The thyroid consisted of follicles and parafollicular cells.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，甲狀腺實質由濾泡和濾泡旁細胞構成。

sentences.english: After that, the survival curves are parallel, indicating similar rates of bleb failure.
sentences.chinese: 此後，存活曲線是平行的，表明濾泡失敗的機率一樣。

sentences.english: Normal thyroid follicles appear at the lower right.
sentences.chinese: 右下是正常的甲狀腺濾泡。
